1097980.name: Visual Novel Maker - TOKIWA GRAPHICS Event BG No.1 Blacksmith/Tool shop
1097980.description:
Need a place to talk business and build your weaponry? Welcome to your new Blacksmith and Tool Shoppes, with 2 beautifully drawn storefronts that come in 4 color variations each. Let your story to unfold and give your game the backdrop it deserves!

Features:

* Blacksmith and Tool shop BackGround (4 variations each; day, sunset, night, slightly darker)
* Total of 8 BG images for your RPG Maker and Visual Novel Maker projects!
